//: Shift+Enter 向下单元格跳转并选取；Shift+↓ 同前效果；Shift+↑ 向上单元格跳转并选取。
on: keydown(td,th)|ev('key') include('Enter', 'ArrowUp', 'ArrowDown') scam('shift') both pass avoid evo(2); downcell|data('tbo') ev('detail') call('columnNextCell', _1) dup pass pop; upcell|data('tbo') ev('detail') call('columnPrevCell', _1) dup pass pop; ^obted|evo(1) table(_1)
